name: In The Eyes Of Death... Quiz | Heavy Metal | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
'Slowly We Rot'.

	This was released on Roadrunner in 1988.

questions.text: Which band has James Murphy not played guitar for?

questions.explanation:
guitar.

	Rob Barret was on 'The Bleeding' by Cannibal Corpse.

questions.text: Which album is not by Mortician?
When was Broken Hope's 'Swamped in Gore' released?
Malevolent Creation and Obituary both hail from...

questions.explanation:
True.

	They tune them differently than Morbid Angel and Korn. Rather than tuning low, they tune high so they can play those insanely high solos.

'IX Equilibrium'.

	'Vempire' is by Cradle of Filth.
